anInt11 - most likely a method counter.
Westbay, … what the fuck do you think an exception handler is?
[/quote]is that the thing that handles exceptions???
[/quote]no, dumbass.
[/sarcasm]
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/essential/exceptions/
[/quote]HE WAS BEING SARCASTIC

And he countered it with more sarcasm

Sarcasm is way too hard to identify on the internet lol, and it always ends up with either more sarcasm to make it worse, or someone takes it serious so the OP looks like a retard :)[/quote]
[offtopic]yo ppl, does Sarcasm get you Orgasm? [/offtopic]

item.title: Flow stuff
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Generally removing all of the wrapping exception handlers (they’re the ones that appear in every method) works well.

Also anInt11++; might be the method counter but I’m not sure.

Read full topic
